articles.description: Intel has announced details for its upcoming Thunderbolt 4 specification for USB-C, which offers the same 40Gbps speeds but looks to raise the minimum support for data transfer and displays to surpass both Thunderbolt 3 and the upcoming USB4 standard.
articles.content:
Filed under:
USB4 is already getting surpassed

articles.author: Steve Vegvari
articles.title: Samsung Set to Reveal Note 20 During Virtual Unpacked on August 5th - iPhone in Canada
articles.description: The Galaxy Z Fold 2 and Galaxy Z Flip 2 will also be revealed during the keynote.
articles.content:
Samsung is set to hold a virtual ‘Unpacked’ to reveal its upcoming new devices, including the Note 20, Galaxy Z Fold 2, and Galaxy Z Flip. The keynote has been revealed to be held on August 5th.
